title: My Spiti Sojourn
description: The author seeks your company while she backpacks alone on a trip to the mountains. She wants you to join her when she gate crashes into a Kinnauri wedding and dances to the first snow. She wants company when she confronts a mummy and visits a vault full of millennium old paintings. You can bite into the juicy apples as you walk with her, meeting people through the pages of this book as she takes you on a virtual trip to the Spiti valley and back.
author: Hitha Nanjappa
